attributes.action: Invoke article 50 immediately & without delay. The Democratic vote demands this.
attributes.additional_details: A referendum was held and the UK voted to leave the EU. This is the will of the majority of people in the UK so immediate action is demanded.
attributes.background: The UK has voted to leave the EU in a referendum. People with their own personal and financial / power ambitions are trying to stop this Democratic decision for their own personal gains. This cannot be allowed to happen and the will of the people in a democratic vote has to be enforced.
